description: The semester is in full swing and our four (five?) girls could not be more on their own. But when tragedy strikes, they realize what a small world the big city can be and discover the strength sticking together gives them.
name: Forever After Days

description: Dash finally gets a chance to uncover the truth about who killed his mother – but the offer comes from an unlikely source. "You Gotta Sin to Get Saved" continues!
name: You Gotta Sin to Get Saved, Part Four of Five: Are You Honest Enough to Live Outside the Law?

story_arc_credits.name: You Gotta Sin to Get Saved

first_appearance_storyarcs.name: You Gotta Sin to Get Saved

description: In this final Deluxe Edition hardcover collecting Y #49-60, Yorick and Agent 355 prepare for their ultimate quest to reunite the last man with his lost love, while the person, people or thing behind the disaster that wiped out half of humanity is revealed. Then, Yorick Brown's long journey through an Earth populated only by women comes to its dramatic, unexpected conclusion.
name: Book Five

volume.name: Y: The Last Man - The Deluxe Edition

description: Meet Lawrence "Larry" Kirkland, the newest animator in St. Louis. Short, skinny, like an overgrown Howdy Doody puppet. It's his first night on the job and Larry's bitten off than any novice animator can chew. Good thing veteran Anita Blake is on call to pull his fat out of the fire!
name: 3 of 5

volume.name: Anita Blake, Vampire Hunter: Circus of the Damned - The Ingenue

description: null

volume.name: Anita Blake, Vampire Hunter: Guilty Pleasures Handbook

description:
Get your hands on these damn dirty Apes! Beginning an all-new series that takes place before the original 1968 Planet of the Apes movie in the continuity of the first five films! Ape society has reached a new golden age.

But there are ripples of dissent in both the ape and human ranks. Tensions will rise and soon all will be caught in chaos!

And amidst all this uncertainty, what is the fate of The Lawgiver?
name: The Long War, Part 1

description: Long ago, the seeds of a vampire cataclysm were planted in the Marvel Universe. One lone vampire rose above the rest and operated in the shadows as the world around him changed. Prepare for a clash of steel, blood, and the undead in Throne of Blood, as Marvel changes the way you see vampires...and shows you the meaning of Fear Itself.
name: Throne of Blood

volume.name: Tomb of Dracula Presents Throne of Blood

description: A history overview of the Mighty Thor. And it was for free!
name: The Mighty Thor Saga

description: Classified!
name: Fantastic Voyage, Part 1; Infested, Stage 1: Bug Time; Can't Get The Service, Part 2

description: Your monthly dose of Cap is now bigger than ever, as a new era begins! Now also starring STEVE ROGERS, SUPER-SOLDIER in a story that intertwines with, and complements, the main story, both written by Cap mastermind Ed Brubaker. Bucky's life takes a turn no one ever expected, but that's all top secret. Meanwhile, Steve Rogers faces a world without a Captain America...
name: Gulag, Part 2

description:
A Tale of Suspense and Psychological Horror!

Brian Cohn has reached his breaking point. He has also figured out who is following in his father’s footsteps. Unfortunately, the stress of dealing with his father’s legacy has taken its toll and Brian worries it may too late.
name: Echoes

description:
The Pilot Season Winner is Back!

The clock counts down to zero as the taut, pulse pounding series races to its conclusion. Carin Taylor, the hero known as Velocity, has been infected with a deadly techno-virus. Thus far she has been successful in saving most of her teammates from the same virus, but now the exertion is taking its toil and the fastest girl in the world may not be able to win this race. The issue concludes the creative collaboration of writer Ron Marz (Witchblade, Angelus) and artist Kenneth Rocafort (Cyberforce/Hunter-Killer).
name: Decoys Part 4

description: Steve Rogers' old friend and fellow soldier John Steele is working with the Shadow Council against the Secret Avengers and against the world. What dark secret led to Steele's fall from grace? Can Steve Rogers learn the secret in time to save his friend and stop the Shadow Council? And if all else fails, can the Secret Avengers rise to the occasion and stop this covert menace?
name: The Trouble With John Steele - Part 2 of 2

description: This timeless tale unfolds during the tumultuous Second Baron's War, when a young prince is ruthlessly abducted from his royal family, taken into the rugged mountains of Derbyshire, and brainwashed to forget his very heritage. He's trained to become the greatest swordsman the world has ever known--and grows to be the most dreaded name in all of Britain! With civil war looming upon the horizon, the fate of the kingdom of England may very well rest in his hands!
name: The Outlaw Prince
Diamond Lies

description: Rick makes a fateful decision in prison after the killer reveals himself within the walls of the penitentiary. Order within the group is starting to deteriorate, forcing Team Grimes to come to some harsh realities of their situation.

He's baa-aaack! No, not Deadpool (though he is back, from outer space)--Macho Gomez! And this time, he's brought friends. His friends? Nope...Deadpool's friends. And every single one of them has an axe to grind with our boy Wade for how he's treated them in the past. No, really--they have axes!
name: Homecoming!

description:
Magic is everywhere in this world populated by elves and men , the planet is born of it . Over time men have learned to harness this magic power at once docile and destructive .
But as time passes, the more it becomes a weapon daily , men abuse , endangering the survival of the planet . Malduk , a member of the High Council of Magic prepares a Machiavellian plan to capture the magic . To face him , a rebel group will hold her head with these rows : Aéris , the former general 's personal guard Malduk ....
name: Preview

description: To counter any new threat, Keepers of the Earth decided to form a new generation of heroes by hosting a reality show. In parallel, two young boys decide to form their own groups to Guardians.
name: first episode

description: It is said that the Empire of Japan was created by the goddess Amaterasu, who ordered his little son Ninigi down on earth and govern it. For this she gave him the sword of Susanoo, the mirror Yata no Kagami and the jewel Yasakani No Magat. The latter was transofrmer in humans and because its hidden power (most powerful of the 3 objects) perverts the emperor Korei and angry gods. Centuries passed and Seimu, the present Emperor, obsessed with the jewel Yasakani No Magat, will do anything to harness its power ...
name: Preview

description: Spider-Girl is fresh off her battle with the grim huntress, Ana Kravinoff, and determined to do a little hunting of her own... setting her sights on the new Hobgoblin! But this Hobgoblin has a few surprises in his bag of tricks, and Anya Corazon may need the help of a friend to win the battle... or even survive. Guest starring Spider-Man!
name: #Hobgoblin

description: Isabel Giovanni is in Beijing, home of the Kuei-jin, KINDRED of the east. With her is Nicholas Pope, her servant and savant, who she will use to unlock the gates of the mountain palace of Quinggong, an ancient realm destroyed by the gods a millenium ago, and that holds important secrets for all the children of the night.
name: One-Shot

description:
In the aftermath of the latest battle, the Jedi, the Galactic Alliance, and Roan Fel’s Imperials retreat to the stronghold planet Bastion to lick their wounds. In the face of the Sith Empire’s new secret weapon, there are some who counsel that resistance is futile.

But the Sith have suffered, too, and Emperor Fel knows that now is the time to attack. Plans are made and plans within plans. For Cade Skywalker knows that this war must ultimately come down to him versus Darth Krayt.

No matter what the cost, Krayt must die!
name: War Part Five

description: Is the end of the end of the new Thunderstrike? Will he suffer the same fate as the original? To save the universe from the merciless Mangog, he must now join forces with the mighty Avengers--the team that he believes betrayed Eric Masterson! Guest-starring Steve Rogers, Spider-Man, Wolverine, Iron Man and the man the new Thunderstrike hates most of all--the mighty Thor!
name: The Storm and The Sacrifice

description: Murder! When a prominent businessman is murdered in a closed house, everyone inside is a subject, even Kato! Kato, working undercover for the Sentinel, has to find the murderer while keeping his true identity hidden. But everyone else is hiding a secret too. Can Kato crack the case in time?
name: The Hellfire Club (Part Two)

description: After the status quo altering events of last issue, Kurt and Daniel must come to grips with what's happened... But the Apparition is still out there, and it won't rest until Haunt is pulled from the realm of the living.

Aboard the mysterious vessel Leviathan, Steve “Marineman” Ocean and Lieutenant Greene bear witness to some shocking revelations regarding Marineman's unknown past! But is the disclosure true?! If it is, then everything Marineman thought he knew about himself may be a lie!
name: CHAPTER FIVE : FAMILY TIDES

description: The worm turns as Paul begins to investigate his handler Gabriel, the brutal angel who torments him, but his efforts lead to a more horrible discovery than he could have imagined.

Based on the hit PS3 game! Cole survived his first encounter with David, a horrific creature of unimaginable power, but now he must contend with Trish Dailey, his dead girlfriend . . . who's now working for Agent Moya.

A mysterious super villain has weaponized Antarctic. Vibranium to sell to dictators, madmen and terrorists across the globe. To stop this WMD, the US military unleashes the enhanced black ops agent Venom! First stop on his hunt: The Savage Land! But who’s hunting who? Venom soon discovers that death stalks these jungles; Kraven the Hunter stalks these jungles! Rick Remender (UNCANNY X-FORCE, PUNISHER) and Tony Moore (PUNISHER, The Walking Dead) give you ringside seats to the grittiest, down-and-dirtiest brawl of the year! Venom vs. Kraven the Hunter!

The world is in panic as Godzilla reduces Tokyo to rubble. No one knows where the giant lizard has come from and even the most extreme military counter-measures prove useless. As the people of Japan struggle to survive Godzilla's wrath, the world's governments start thinking outside the box. Unfortunately, Godzilla may not be the only monster-sized threat the world faces...

Conan goes against his ingrained barbarian instincts and sides with a strange wizard in order to topple those who ensnared them both in the horrific dungeons beneath the Scarlet Citadel! Timothy Truman, Tomas Giorello, and Jose Villarrubia-the monthly team behind the critically acclaimed Conan the Cimmerian comic-book run-move ahead many years in the barbarian’s life to a time when Conan has just lost the crown of Aquilonia and must fight to reclaim it from several betrayers and their evil wizard!
name: The Halls of Hell, Part 3 of 4

description: See the Hulk as you’ve never seen him before: as an international super-spy! With Amadeus Cho as his guide, Hulk dons a tuxedo and enters into a world of espionage, only to find his opponent is…Red She-Hulk? And what happens when Betty finds a new man? Hint: it doesn't really go over that well…especially when that man is one of the Hulk's oldest foes!
name: Robert Bruce Banner is The Spy Who Smashed Me

description: Volume 7  this  is an book  well done.  Aymar de  Bois - Maury  left for  the  Holy Land  with his  squire  Olivier,  the impetuous  knight  William  English,  the  abrupt, rude,  chauvinistic, but no  less  sympahique  Dutchman  Hendrik  knight,  and a  handful  of pilgrims.  Much  of  the  story  takes  place  in  Central Europe,  and  many surprises await  our group.  Fatigue  and  hunger  are read  on  the faces  and  postures  to the smallest  stroke of a pen.  A  trip  closer to reality.  A test  of  suffering  and  pain  told  with  skill  by  Hermann, despite  the  final  plot  is weak.
name: William

description:
This  book  is  set  apart  in  the Towers  of Bois - Maury, sharing between the  life of  the  castle  and  ancient myths,  and  taking  place on the  foggy  coast  of Normandy.  Hermann  wanted  to  revisit  the  way  the ancient myths,  those  of Odin  and  Thor.  It's  quite  successful,  despite the  unlikely  side  and  disappointment  what will have been  created that title for  many readers .

One can  be  surprised  by  this  album,  see  disturbed, but  the  mastery of  Hermann  is certain  authenticity  of the life of  a knight,  master graphic  landscapes,  because  of  fog,  wind  and salt, felt  feelings  of Aymar  and  especially  the  disturbing side,  mystical, intriguing ,  and graphically  looking  fantastic.
name: Sigurd

description:
Aymar  arrives  at  his  old  friend  Yvon de  Portel ,  whose  lands  were devastated  by the  plague  and  about  which  only remain  faithful few whose  friendship  seem  very  interested .  In  addition ,  nearby , a  band of  marauders  is  the  region  of  Tours  in  fire and  blood ,  while  attacking the convoy  appeared to have  value .

The  atmosphere  is  heavy ,  heavy  ...  in that  this album is  not  as pleasant  to read .  Yvon  remains  of  Portel ,  a  single man  who  is  truly the album  on  his  shoulders .  Hermann  damage  is  not  able  to  serve us  as  a  scenario  that  leads  to  the  previous  titles .
name: Alda

description:
Aymar de  Bois - Maury  Olivier  and  his squire  about to  cross  the Pyrenees ,  and  intersect  their path  German  Reinhardt ,  imposing figure , the archetype  of the knight  at  once  courageous  and full of himself ,  inviting  and  provocative ,  having  no equal  in  bravery  and stupidity  combine .  It  is  here  to  face his  brother,  who  wants to  buy up the  feud  that  has just  inherited  from his father .

This  is  a  volume - dark  and violent .  Beautiful  too ,  with  this  mysterious girl  who  appears  throughout  the album,  and  this  very  successful  end in triumph .  Aymar  is  finally  a  truly  dominant  place  in this  story.
name: Reinhardt

description:
This book takes place in an arid Spain , the lavish decor . The band of the Pie, thieves, burglars, muggers, could not help but seize the property of a wealthy monastery . Favard, a man of brutal and violent gun goes off with his men in search of the robbers . Then begins a ruthless pursuit .

The environment is unforgiving , men perspire , everything is dry and mountainous landscapes are sublime ... Beautiful scenery and a tragic story that is equally important. An album harsh , tragic and beautiful, where the battle of life becomes an epic . Probably the best title of the first cycle, driven by a drawing and a division which have matured .
name: Germain

description:
As winter  hits  hard  Caulx  of  the country , a  band of  robber  just  sack the  castle  area  and remember to  burn  the  houses  nearby.  In this period  of  suffering  arrives  Aymar ,  a land  where  hovers a  strong desire  for revenge .  Not  to mention  the  arrival  of  an  enigmatic parallel :  Eloise  of  Montgri .

In  parallel  is  not without  pleasure  follows  the  life  of the  village econstitution :  the  comic  old man  who  has more to  her  than  hen 's life , this  young  noble  who  tries to  restore  a semblance  of authority ,  those peasants  who  are trying  somehow  to  survive  ...

The boards  are  darker,  the  story  holds up , the  scenario  is pretty  well done  ...  short,  a  good  album  of the Towers  of  Bois - Maury  although  a little  worse  than the last .
name: Eloïse de Montgri

description: In  New  Jersey  Vlad  III  and  the detective  of the New York  Police  Victor  Daly  desperately  kicking against  the vampires ,  obeying  his brother  Vlad  Mears  ...  Which can  become even  greater threat  than  the vampires  ...

name: Bent Beak and the Phantom's Mark

description: Captured! On his way to deliver stolen state secrets, Conan is abducted by the King of Nemedia and asked to turn over the name of the accomplice who sent him on this errand. Conan’s loyalty is strong, but will it be strong enough to overcome the Nemedian inquisitor who will stop at nothing to force Conan to reveal all he knows? Bound and tortured-if Conan is able to escape, he may not be able to catch up to the beautiful Olivia, who has been kidnapped by the dastardly Fharos!
name: [Untitled]

description:
The Dark Avengers are helpless before the terrifying power of the Molecule Man, and Norman Osborn is on the brink of insanity! Who or what can save them?!

Also: the fate of the X-Men sends Ronin on a mission of vengeance – with terrible consequences!

Includes material reprinted from Dark Avengers #12, Amazing Spider-Man #601, How to Break into Comics #1 and Dark Reign: The List – Avengers #1.
name: The Madness of the Molecule Man

description:
With his beloved Gail's life hanging in the balance, the Man of the Atom faces his archenemy Nuro's Nuclear Ninja-warriors skilled in the arts of stealth, deception . . . and death. It's martial-arts mayhem on a cosmic scale! Plus, the astonishing origin of the Man of the Atom continues! In the searing ergozone of a black hole, all of time and space is laid bare to Dr. Phillip Solar. World War III is imminent. So is the death of his eleven-year-old sister . . . If only he could do something! But maybe he can . . .

This is another two part story from Jim Shooter. In the present day story, we see Doctor Solar take on an enemy that's been sent by his enemy Nuro. Can Dr. Solar defeat this villain and save the life of Gail Sanders?

In part two, we see more of Dr Solar's origin. We see his childhood growing up during the 1960's and what drove him to become the scientist he is today.

**note** The table of contents lists the first story as "Revelation Part Two: That Dreadful Day" but the first page of the story has the title as "Revelation Part Two: ...That Fateful Day..."
name: Revelation Part 2: That Dreadful Day; Solar Rise Part Two: Scared To Death

volume.name: Doctor Solar, Man of the Atom

description: Mary Kelly's dead, but was she supposed to die? In a changing future, the Doctor discovers his actions have led to a larger number of “canonical” Ripper victims—and that Amy is remembered as the next to be murdered... Can they find her before the future becomes real?
name: Ripper's Curse Part 3 of 3

description: Rasl makes his way back to Annie and has a cruel surprise waiting for him, and just when Rasl least expects it, Agent Sal, The Lizard-Faced Man, returns and starts shooting up a crowded bar! Rasl battles to save the patrons and the Multiverse itself!
name: Best Laid Plans

description: Optimus Prime has reached his goal: the gates of Megatron's citadel. Prime has one thing in mind and he won't let Shockwave or Starscream slow him down-tonight, Megatron must die! Secrets are revealed and lines are crossed as the countdown to Transformers 3 ramps up. How far will Prime go to stop the Decepticons?
name: Part 3 of 4

volume.name: Transformers: Dark of the Moon: Movie Prequel: Foundation

description: The celebration of 70 years of Walt Disney’s Comics continues with an entire issue of stories never before seen in the United States! Donald finds himself on a Jurassic jaunt in William Van Horn’s “Just in Time,” while Gyro’s inventions spin out of control in “The Invented Inventor!” And how could we forget “Proof Positive,” a rare 1964 Paul Murry story new to our shores? Features a brand-new cover by William Van Horn!
name: Just in Time; The Inventor's Inventor; To The Moon By Noon

description:
Nirvana frontman Kurt Cobain team (Kurt Cobain) became the hero of comic books.  The book is about the musician's life was published in Britain.  Plot «Godspeed: The Kurt Cobain Graphic» consists of both the real facts from the life of Cobain, and from the fictional. 
The book tells about the life of Cobain - a child, participation in Nirvana, married to Courtney Love and suicide, which he committed in April 1994.  The whole history of generously illustrated.  According to the writer Barnaby Legg (Barnaby Legg), the author's stories, he tried at the same time not violate anyone's copyright, and at the same time convey to the reader the importance of music Cobain, which is relevant to this day.  In this case, Legg wants to clear name "Nirvana" of all the dirt that accompanies the group.

The True Blood contamination scandal escalates! Sookie goes to Eric for help and finds herself in a whole new batch of trouble. Meanwhile, Jessica's condition worsens and the violence escalates... will Bill be her next victim?!
name: "Tainted Love" Part 3

description: THE SECRET IS OUT! Word of Steve Rogers' clandestine operations has leaked to the world, kicking off a global race by the Secret Avengers to save compromised superhuman assets before they can be taken off the board! Behind it all: a mystery man in familiar garb, who'll force the Super-Soldier to confront some very hard realities about his new role as a general.
name: Fear Itself, Pt. 1: The Captain
